column1: Success is in direct proportion to the capacity of experiencing new great things all the time
column2: "Paint a path for others and you will lead the way"

column5: "Approach your work as if it were a game
column6: and strive to excel as if it were a must."

column12: "You can't just sit around and wait for opportunities to come. YOU have to actively create them for yourself."
